actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Reported to House from the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs with amendment, H. Rept. 93-112.
Measure passed House, amended, roll call #124 (336-8).
Measure laid on table in House, S. 721 passed in lieu.

official_title: A bill to authorize appropriations for the Indian Claims Commission for fiscal year 1974.

summary.text: (LATEST SUMMARY) Authorizes appropriations of $1,200,000 for fiscal year 1974 to carry out the provisions of the Indian Claims Commission Act. Increases appropriations to $2,700,000 for the revolving fund for loans for expert assistance for the preparation and trial of claims pending before the Commission.

titles.title: A bill to authorize appropriations for the Indian Claims Commission for fiscal year 1974.
